mapper.select: select R.id as id, R.content as content, D.id as user_id, D.name as user_name, DL.id as driver_license_id, DL.number as driver_license_number from Reviews R join Drivers D on R.driver_id = D.id join Driver_License DL on D.driver_license_id = DL.id where R.id = #{id}

select R.id as id, R.content as content, D.id as user_id, D.name as user_name, DL.id as driver_license_id, DL.number as driver_license_number from Reviews R join Drivers D on R.driver_id = D.id join Driver_License DL on D.driver_license_id = DL.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reviews (id, content, driver_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{driver.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE Reviews SET content = #{content}, driver_id = #{driver.id} WHERE id = #{id}
